300.plain:
Hi,

Unfortunately woocommerce 'Inventory' option available only for 'simple' 
& 'variable' products. it won't support 'Bundle' product type.

However I am including Inventory support for 'Bundle' product type, on 
my next release, it's not yet ready ( as some other improvements are 
also in the progress )

Will let you know once I released.



Regards
Sark




On Wednesday 09 September 2015 07:42 PM, Cristina De Simone wrote:
> Hi Saravana, sorry for my english...
>
> I'm using your plugin "WC Product Bundles" and it is great, but I have 
> a problem.
> It does not allow the management the bundle's stock when the products 
> included are supplied.
> The tab "Inventory" in the "Bundle" product does not exist and so is 
> impossible update it.
> Is there a way to fix this?
>
> Thank you!

301.html:
Hi Cristina,

Glad it you liked my plugin ( as well as my country ) Thank you :)

Mahabalipuram right, Once a great city ( approx 1400 years ago - belongs to Pallava Dynasty ), now it is a great tourist place ( of course you know that ).
It's strange that I never visited that place, eventhough I am staying in Chennai ( Madras ) which is just 80KM away. Have to visit soon.!


Regards
Sark


On Thursday 10 September 2015 02:59 AM, Cristina De Simone wrote:
PS: I am italian... but, I love india ... it has remained in my heart.
I came in India in 1990. I turned a little, from west to east, and I also visited your zones, I was staying in Mahabalipuram ;)

2015-09-09 23:12 GMT+02:00 Cristina De Simone <desimone.cristina@gmail.com>:
Hi Sark,

Well, I will continue to use your plugin and I will wait for the new release because I really like your plugin.
I've tried other plugins and one of them "Yith WooCommerce Product Bundles" (you know it?), it manages inventory, but does not have features such as your ... your is always the best! :-)

Thanks again ;)
Cri

2015-09-09 16:52 GMT+02:00 Sarkware <sark@sarkware.com>:
Hi,

Unfortunately woocommerce 'Inventory' option available only for 'simple' & 'variable' products. it won't support 'Bundle' product type.

However I am including Inventory support for 'Bundle' product type, on my next release, it's not yet ready ( as some other improvements are also in the progress )

Will let you know once I released.



Regards
Sark





On Wednesday 09 September 2015 07:42 PM, Cristina De Simone wrote:
Hi Saravana, sorry for my english...

I'm using your plugin "WC Product Bundles" and it is great, but I have a problem.
It does not allow the management the bundle's stock when the products included are supplied.
The tab "Inventory" in the "Bundle" product does not exist and so is impossible update it.
Is there a way to fix this?

Thank you!

304.html:
Ma'am,

Sorry for the delay in the reply, please call us on 9940495410 any time at your convenience, we'll give u all the details. Apart from our regular drawing class we are starting with a new drawing Sir, Raju Master from October, Mondays & Fridays, (5:00-6:00).
He is planning to do lot of interesting things with the children, using different type of colors, methods & activities. 
Apart from this, we have various other activities like phonetics, yoga (for children & mothers both), dance & recently we have started Theater classes with renowned story teller Sheetal.
Please call us for detailed enquiry.
Monika.

Hi,

Thank you for your mail. I recognized your number, I mostly work through out the night, thats why I wasn't able to pick up your call ( sleeping ), you can reach me after 2 PM ( any time ).


If it is for any JOB offer then my answer would be NO.
I am a freelancer ( doing really great )

If you have any project offer please feel free to contact me.!



Regards
Sark

I will update it on my next release. as a quick solution, you can edit it yourself.

On Thursday 17 September 2015 01:54 PM, Pierre Wiberg wrote:
Hi,

We just tried your plugin wc product bundles. It works Great, fantastic job!!

I have a few requests that I changed for a client.
The bundled products get <h1>-tags for the product title, regarding to SEO-rules you are only allowed to have one <h1>-tag per page or else google will be a little confused so to speak :-) Is it possible for you to change the tags to <h2>-tags or <h3/>-tags on the bundle product titles?

Thanks!


Med vänliga hälsningar
Pierre Wiberg • 0761 62 20 43 • pierre@kircherrodewiberg.se • www.kircherrodewiberg.se

313.html:
Hi,

What that error means Woocommerce is not found ( or some other issue ). Please check whether woocommerce is Active and working properly.

If nothing helped, Please try to update you Wooocmmerce plugin to latest version ( 2.4.6 ), that should solve the issue.

Let me know any issues.


Regards
Sark




On Sunday 20 September 2015 03:46 AM, Emmett Harris wrote:
(I tried to send the below at your website, but I'm not sure that it went through.)

Hi, 

I am trying to use your WC Product Bundles plugin, Version 1.0.7, and I keep getting the below error:

Fatal error: Call to undefined function wc_setup_product_data() in /home/wp_8dwbmb/fsplf.dreamhosters.com/wp-content/plugins/wc-product-bundles/classes/dao.php on line 84.  

The WooCommerce version I am using is Version 2.2.6, WP Version 4.3.1.  

Any help with solving this would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Emmett Harris

314.html:
Hi,

Just wanted to update, I tested with 2.2.6 and I too got the same error ( it appear Woo 2.2 versions ), though its working fine on 2.3 and 2.4 series.

I will try to fix this issue. In the mean time you can update your woocommerce to 2.3 or 2.4 series.


Regards
Sark


-------------------------

Hi,

What that error means Woocommerce is not found ( or some other issue ). Please check whether woocommerce is Active and working properly.

If nothing helped, Please try to update you Wooocmmerce plugin to latest version ( 2.4.6 ), that should solve the issue.

Let me know any issues.


Regards
Sark

334.html:
Senthil,

Have you tried this : https://apps.shopify.com/country-pricing-auto-switch






On Monday 28 September 2015 01:49 PM, connect wrote:
Hi Saravanan,

Below are the background of the requirement:

We have purchased the below THEME and gone LIVE with new store.
http://ella-demo-3.myshopify.com/

Store URL: http://www.dfynorm.com/

Requirement is: 
Need to show the VAT prices inclusive / Exclusive based on the Country.
Basically, if someone access the website from UK, product price will be inclusive of TAX.
If it is other country, product price should be exclusive of TAX.

ex: Actual product price: 1000

      For UK, we need to show as inclusive of tax as 1200.
      For non-UK countries, it should be 1000 (exclusive tax)


From Shopify Forum, we have tried the below 2 methods.

> https://docs.shopify.com/manual/configuration/store-customization/page-specific/product-page/show-vat-price#main

In this method, there is one major limitation of variant. So, we have dropped this.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

> https://ecommerce.shopify.com/c/ecommerce-design/t/adding-vat-to-prices-using-math-filter-36227
 
Can we integrate this method of Math filter option? Please estimate and share the details.

Actually We have tried this method, but we are getting some error after integration. check this url.

oligarcy.myshopify.com
password: oligarcy

After submitting this add to cart, through some error??? not able to fix.

Let me know if you have any queries/clarification on the requriement.

thanks and regards,

senthil

founder and ceo, oligarcy

email    : sen@oligarcy.in

mobile  : +91-81 232 676 57

skype   : connect.oligarcy

www.oligarcy.in

bangalore, chennai - india

We can do it, my expected time estimation is 3 Weeks ( with 2 Developers ).

Sark
